William-Jennings-Bryan:
He is a three time presidential nominee
Profession: Politician
nicknames: Boy Orator of the Platte, The Fundamentalist Pope, The Great Commoner, The Silver Knight of the West
Resigned as Woodrow Wilson's secretary of state
Was an orator(public speaker)
Was an orator of the "Cross of Gold" speech.
popular for: "You shall not crucify mankind on a cross of gold" in the Cross of Gold Speech
gettysburg-address:
Author: Abraham Lincoln
Addressed for: Battle Cemetery
Date: November 19, 1863
Begins: Four Score and seven years ago
claims: The world will little note, nor long remember what we say here
Resolves: These dead shall not die in vain
